name: Heatblast v2
description:
Welcome to Heatblast !
a 2d-Tower-Defense-Strategy-game, made during one week as part of the third BlackThornProd Gamejam, with the theme "Less is more".

NOTE: This is not the submission to the jam. This is the updated version, where it applied all the feedback.
Click here  to see the original submission.

 Controls:

Interact: Click
Pause: P 

Have Fun!
